sentences.en: Body temperature can fluctuate if you are ill.
sentences.cn: 人患病后体温可能会上下波动。

sentences.en: Both the light and radio outputs fluctuate markedly.
sentences.cn: 光和无线电的输出都引人注目地起伏变化.

sentences.en: China's crude oil shipments tend to fluctuate significantly from month to month.
sentences.cn: 中国原油载运量每月都有显著的波动.

sentences.en: DOES THE PRESSURE FLUCTUATE FROM LESS THAN 5 PSI TO 120 - 150 PSI?
sentences.cn: 压力从小于5PSI波动到120 - 150PSI了 吗 ?

sentences.en: Income tax relief will fluctuate as levels of interest fluctuate.
sentences.cn: 所得税减免额将根据利率水平而变化.

sentences.en: Insect populations fluctuate wildly from year to year.
sentences.cn: 昆虫的数量每年变化很大。

sentences.en: Interest rates tend to fluctuate in a reflection of our ever - changing economy.
sentences.cn: 利率会随著我们瞬息万变的经济状况波动.

sentences.en: Investments in spot and forward foreign exchange contracts can fluctuate in value.
sentences.cn: 外汇现货和远期合约可能会有价值浮动.

sentences.en: It must be much smaller than a star, in order that its signals fluctuate so rapidly.
sentences.cn: 它一定比一颗恒星小得多, 才能如此快速地发出信号.

sentences.en: It's natural activity levels to fluctuate throughout the course of a week.
sentences.cn: 一周中,状态除了波动是正常的.

sentences.en: Notes They often fluctuate with the international money market.
sentences.cn: 它们是随着国际金融市场变化而波动的.

sentences.en: Prices fluctuate from year to year.
Prices were volatile, fluctuating between 20 and 40.
sentences.cn: 价格不稳定，在20至40美元之间波动。

sentences.en: Temperatures can fluctuate a great deal during this time of year.
sentences.cn: 每年这个时候温度的起伏都非常大.

sentences.en: The actual cost may fluctuate above and below that standard.
sentences.cn: 实际成本可在标准成本的上下范围内增减.

sentences.en: Under group conditions sow weight changes can fluctuate wildly.
sentences.cn: 在群饲的情况下,母猪体重波动很大.

sentences.en: When a ship goes in waves, propulsion thrust will fluctuate remarkably.
sentences.cn: 舰船在风浪中摇荡时, 螺旋桨推力将发生明显变化.

trans.tran_en: if a price or amount fluctuates, it keeps changing and becoming higher and lower
if a price or amount fluctuates, it keeps changing and becoming higher and lower
